name: PolymathRegistry

attributes.documentation: @title Utility contract to allow pausing and unpausing of certain functions
attributes.name: Pausable

attributes.documentation: @notice Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is not paused.
attributes.name: whenNotPaused

attributes.documentation: @notice Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is paused.
attributes.name: whenPaused

attributes.documentation: @notice called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state
attributes.name: _pause

attributes.documentation: @notice called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state
attributes.name: _unpause
Ownable

attributes.documentation:
@dev The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender
account.
@dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
attributes.name: onlyOwner

attributes.documentation: @dev Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.
attributes.name: renounceOwnership

attributes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param _newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
attributes.name: transferOwnership

attributes.documentation:
@dev Transfers control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param _newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
attributes.name: _transferOwnership
ERC20Basic

attributes.documentation: @title Utility contract to allow owner to retreive any ERC20 sent to the contract
attributes.name: ReclaimTokens

attributes.documentation:
@notice Reclaim all ERC20Basic compatible tokens
@param _tokenContract The address of the token contract
attributes.name: reclaimERC20
getAddress
changeAddress
